item.title: Digital Nomad Visa Guide 2024
item.description: Digital Nomad Visa Guide 2024 Complete guide to digital nomad visas and remote work permits. Top Nomad-Friendly Countries Portugal: D7 Visa (1-2 years) Estonia: Digital Nomad Visa (1 year) Barbados: Welcome Stamp (1 year) Dubai: Virtual Working Program (1 year) Application Tips Income Requirements: Usually $2000-3500/month Health Insurance: Mandatory for most programs Processing Time: 2-8 weeks typically Remote Work Proof: Employment letter or business registration Planning ahead is key for a smooth nomad journey!
